source:
%%pyspark
dfAddress = spark.read.load('abfss://landing@siddhant2607adls.dfs.core.windows.net/Project/Synapse_Silver/Address/Saleslt.Address/', format='parquet')
dfCustomerAddress = spark.read.load('abfss://landing@siddhant2607adls.dfs.core.windows.net/Project/Synapse_Silver/CustomerAddress/Saleslt.CustomerAddress/', format='parquet')
dfCustomer = spark.read.load('abfss://landing@siddhant2607adls.dfs.core.windows.net/Project/Synapse_Silver/Customer/Saleslt.Customer/', format='parquet')
##display(dfCustomer.limit(10))
dfCustomer = dfCustomer.withColumnRenamed("ModifiedDate", "Customer_ModifiedDate")
dfAddress  = dfAddress.withColumnRenamed("ModifiedDate", "Address_ModifiedDate")
dfCustomer = dfCustomer.withColumnRenamed("rowguid", "Customer_rowguid")
dfAddress  = dfAddress.withColumnRenamed("rowguid", "Address_rowguid")
##display(dfCustomerAddress.limit(10))
##display(dfAddress.limit(10))
dfjoin= dfAddress.join(dfCustomerAddress, on="AddressID",how="full" )
dfjoin2=dfCustomer.join(dfCustomerAddress, on="CustomerID", how="full")
display(dfjoin2.limit(100))
dfjoin2.write.mode("overwrite").save('abfss://landing@siddhant2607adls.dfs.core.windows.net/Project/Synapse_Gold/Customer/Saleslt.Customer')
